Nice to meet you!

I'm a User Experience program manager at Microsoft for Internet Explorer 11+ and beyond. I own the Reading View feature in Immersive IE. My goal is to bring a great reading experience for the web.

I participate in hackathons where I develop new product ideas such as safewalk.co . In the past, I've taken roles in data mining which help me use data to analyze the success of my designs.

My current hobby is biking and sketching :)
